languages.text: "И часто у вас слуги без дозволения лезут в разговоры правителей, губернатор?"
"Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"
languages.original_text: "И часто у вас слуги без дозволения лезут в разговоры правителей, губернатор?"

traits.locale_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"
"Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

"Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

languages.text: “你的仆人总是像这样，未经允许就打断统治者之间的谈话吗，总督？”
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: “你的仆人总是像这样，未经允许就打断统治者之间的谈话吗，总督？”

languages.text: 「総督、君の使用人たちは、いつも許しもなく支配者同士の会話に割り込むのか？」
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: 「総督、君の使用人たちは、いつも許しもなく支配者同士の会話に割り込むのか？」

languages.text: «¿Tienen por costumbre sus sirvientes interrumpir sin permiso las conversaciones de sus soberanos, gobernador?».
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tienen por costumbre sus sirvientes interrumpir sin permiso las conversaciones de sus soberanos, gobernador?».

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlarınız sık sık hükümdarların sözlerini izinsiz keser mi Vali?"
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarınız sık sık hükümdarların sözlerini izinsiz keser mi Vali?"

languages.text: « Vos serviteurs interrompent-ils souvent les conversations de leurs supérieurs sans autorisation, gouverneur ? »
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos serviteurs interrompent-ils souvent les conversations de leurs supérieurs sans autorisation, gouverneur ? »

languages.text: "Kommt es öfter vor, dass Eure Diener ihren Herrschern ungefragt ins Wort fallen, Gouverneur?"
languages.original_text: "Do your servants often interrupt their rulers' conversations without permission, Governor?"

traits.locale_text: "Kommt es öfter vor, dass Eure Diener ihren Herrschern ungefragt ins Wort fallen, Gouverneur?"
